name: lib/context/index.js
content:
export { default as Context } from "./context";
export { default as ContextSet } from "./set";

name: lib/context/selectors.js
lib/context/set.js
ContextSet
description:
Indexed container collection of Contexts
Each Context is indexed by its binary and its associated addresses

name: contextForAddress
description: Retrieve context for code at a given address

name: contextForBinary
description: Retrieve context with a given binary

name: add
description:
Add contexts to the set

Merges with existing contexts

name: addContext
description:
Add Context

If Context already exists in set, merges Context data with existing

name: merge
description: Return a new ContextSet with the merged Contexts of this and another

name: lib/controller/actions/index.js
lib/controller/sagas.js
advance
description: Advance the state by one instruction

name: stepNext
description:
stepNext - step to the next logical code segment

Note: It might take multiple instructions to express the same section of code.
"Stepping", then, is stepping to the next logical item, not stepping to the next
instruction. See advance() if you'd like to advance by one instruction.

name: stepInto
description:
stepInto - step into the current function

Conceptually this is easy, but from a programming standpoint it's hard.
Code like `getBalance(msg.sender)` might be highlighted, but there could
be a number of different intermediate steps (like evaluating `msg.sender`)
before `getBalance` is stepped into. This function will step into the first
function available (where instruction.jump == "i"), ignoring any intermediate
steps that fall within the same code range. If there's a step encountered
that exists outside of the range, then stepInto will only execute until that
step.

name: stepOut
description:
Step out of the current function

This will run until the debugger encounters a decrease in function depth.

name: stepOver
description:
stepOver - step over the current line

Step over the current line. This will step to the next instruction that
exists on a different line of code within the same function depth.

name: lib/debugger.js
forTx
description: Instantiates a Debugger for a given transaction hash.

return.description: initial state for the transaction being debugged

name: lib/web3/index.js
getTransactionInfo
description:
getTransactionInfo - get the primary address, the trace, and whether the transaction
is a contract creation

This will return the to address, if the transaction is made to an existing contract;
or else it will return the address of the contract created as a result of the transaction.

name: getDeployedCode
description: getDeployedCode - get the deployed code for an address from the client

content:
# truffle-debugger
Core functionality for debugging Solidity files built with Truffle
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "truffle-debugger",
  "version": "1.1.0",
  "description": "Core functionality for debugging Solidity files built with Truffle",
  "main": "dist/debugger.js",
  "scripts": {
    "docs": "esdoc",
    "build": "webpack",
    "test": "mocha-webpack --webpack-config webpack.config-test.js"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "ethereum",
    "truffle",
    "debugger",
    "solidity"
  ],
  "author": "Tim Coulter <tim.coulter@consenseys.net>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "async": "^1.5.2",
    "debug": "^3.1.0",
    "node-dir": "^0.1.17",
    "redux": "^3.7.2",
    "redux-cli-logger": "^2.0.1",
    "redux-saga": "^0.16.0",
    "reselect": "^3.0.1",
    "truffle-code-utils": "^1.1.0",
    "truffle-contract": "^3.0.0",
    "truffle-expect": "0.0.3",
    "truffle-solidity-utils": "^1.1.0"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
    "babel-plugin-transform-object-rest-spread": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-plugin-transform-runtime": "^6.23.0",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "babel-runtime": "^6.26.0",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "fs-extra": "^4.0.2",
    "ganache-cli": "^6.0.3",
    "mocha": "^4.0.1",
    "mocha-webpack": "^1.0.1",
    "node-nightly": "^1.7.2",
    "truffle-artifactor": "^3.0.0",
    "truffle-box": "^1.0.3",
    "truffle-core": "^4.0.1",
    "truffle-migrate": "^2.0.0",
    "truffle-resolver": "^4.0.1",
    "web3": "^0.20.2",
    "webpack": "^3.8.1",
    "webpack-dev-server": "^2.10.1",
    "webpack-node-externals": "^1.6.0"
  }
}
name: package.json
